timeline.bodyText:
nit: I'm not sure a link to java-doc is super useful, but possibly linking to FormatOptions might be more useful: https://googleapis.dev/java/google-cloud-clients/latest/com/google/cloud/bigquery/FormatOptions.html (so users can see what FormatOptions are available)
But this sample is specific to the parquet format, so I don't think it's really required.
timeline.author: kurtisvg
